text: @IngrahamAngle @LucyKnows1 Coronavirus racial inequality task force. So that’s what they decide to name this ‘task force’. Don’t think virus really cares what race it infects & if it does, then high % of being engineered. I haven’t heard / seen racism about any biased care, physical attacks based on race.
